meta.label: Custom algo test-plugin_my-algo
meta.description: This is the description of the Custom algo test-plugin_my-algo

params.name: n_estimators
params.label: num estimators
params.description: The maximum number of estimators at which boosting is terminated. In case of perfect fit, the learning procedure is stopped early.

params.name: learning_rate
params.label: learning rate
params.description: Lower values slow down convergence and can make the model more robust. Typical values: 0.01 - 0.3

params.name: random_state
params.label: Random state
params.description: Using a fixed random seed allows for reproducible result.
